DOC.brief_summary: BCG vaccination has been found to provide greater protection against TB in the UK than in Malawi. This study compares immune responses in BCG-vaccinated and unvaccinated teenagers and young adults in Malawi and in the UK.
DOC.brief_title: Immune Responses to BCG Vaccination in Malawi and the UK
DOC.criteria: BCG unvaccinated HIV negative Not pregnant Informed Consent HIV positive Pregnant Seriously ill
